optimized_sql: WITH filtered_sales AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT ss_store_sk, ss_item_sk, SUM(ss_sales_price) AS revenue FROM store_sales JOIN date_dim ON ss_sold_date_sk = d_date_sk WHERE d_month_seq BETWEEN 1215 AND 1226 AND ss_sales_price / ss_list_price BETWEEN 0.79 AND 0.89 GROUP BY ss_store_sk, ss_item_sk), store_avg AS NOT MATERIALIZED (SELECT ss_store_sk, AVG(revenue) AS ave FROM filtered_sales GROUP BY ss_store_sk), low_revenue_items AS NOT MATERIALIZED (SELECT f.ss_store_sk, f.ss_item_sk, f.revenue FROM filtered_sales f JOIN store_avg a ON f.ss_store_sk = a.ss_store_sk WHERE f.revenue <= 0.1 * a.ave), join_store_item AS NOT MATERIALIZED (SELECT s.s_store_name, i.i_item_desc, l.revenue, i.i_current_price, i.i_wholesale_cost, i.i_brand FROM low_revenue_items l JOIN store s ON l.ss_store_sk = s.s_store_sk JOIN item i ON l.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk WHERE i.i_manager_id BETWEEN 10 AND 14 AND s.s_state IN ('KS','OH','SD')) SELECT s_store_name, i_item_desc, revenue, i_current_price, i_wholesale_cost, i_brand FROM join_store_item ORDER BY s_store_name, i_item_desc LIMIT 100
hint: Apply the single materialization of store_sales+date_dim scan with price filter,
